instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 ppvout_s0_lcdbklt 0v
threads.message: Hello everyone I got a macbook a1502 820-4924 were the fan spins after 1-2mim of connecting the magsafe and t it doesn't show a image. I checked the voltage on ppvout_s0_lckbklt and I'm getting 0v on it. I tried a good working LCD and I'm still getting no image. The diode and fuse seem to be fine. Any suggestions? Thanks!!

threads.title: 820-4924 ppvout_s0_lcdbklt 0v
threads.message: If there is no image why even bother measuring backlight circuit? You using a known good 2015 LCD? Must be 2015 model, nothing else works. History of the machine?
